description:
Replace direct agent-to-agent calls with an event bus pattern where agents emit domain events (e.g., KnowledgeGathered, StepCompleted) and subscribe to relevant events. Implement using a lightweight in-process event dispatcher with optional persistence for audit trails.

**Rationale:** Current tight coupling between agents (e.g., MainSolver orchestrating Analysis/Solve loops) makes it difficult to modify agent behavior, add new agents, or test agents in isolation. Event-driven design would enable better separation of concerns and easier extension.
title: Introduce Event-Driven Architecture for Agent Communication
